sub_032_ecology_02:
Congratulations on winning the Academy Ace
Tournament.[npcn:2A]
sub_032_ecology_03:
I sure am proud to have one of my students
become the academy’s ace![npcn:2A]
sub_032_ecology_04:
Ah, don’t worry, Director Clavell. I’ll get to the
point now.[npcn:2A]
sub_032_ecology_05:
I’m actually calling to tell you that highly difficult
Tera Raids are cropping up all over the place.[npcn:2A]
sub_032_ecology_06:
We’re getting report after report from academy
students about their Pokémon getting injured.[npcn:2A]
sub_032_ecology_07:
We teachers have split up to investigate these
raids, but we’re still a bit shorthanded.[npcn:2A]
sub_032_ecology_08:
[BD06:0]Sooo, we were wondering if we could enlist your
help, since you’re the academy’s ace and all.\r
How about it, [trnm:0]?[npcn:2A]
sub_032_select_02: If I can find the time...
sub_032_ecology_10:
Your Pokédex automatically records the data we
need as you go, so don’t worry about that![npcn:2A]
sub_032_ecology_11:
For now, I’d like you to just take on a lot of these
tough Tera Raid Battles![npcn:2A]
sub_032_ecology_12:
But don’t get in over your head. Even the
academy’s ace needs to be careful![npcn:2A]
sub_032_ecology_13:
I sure would be sad if one of my precious
students got injured.[npcn:2A]
